results.name: 60 SECONDS OF SHOOTING UNTIL YOU NEED TO GO SHOPPING
FS22 Buy or Storage of Tar

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64bit Windows
  • Processor: 2Ghz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GT or Radeon HD 2900XT
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64bit Windows
  • Processor: Core i5 Gen10 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 or Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
